metadata.synopsis: A short VB after player heals the Owlbear in gameplay. Owlbear is still dangerous, though. This can happen either before or after the player has interacted with Owlbear. It's meant to give feedback on the fact that the owlbear is now healed, but not to encourage the player to provoke her.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Healed - but she doesn't look much happier.
0.context: NodeContext: Karlach: 'I healed you, owlbear--> you still look like you're gonna rip my face off.'
